text: kya ve dharatee mein chale-phire nahin ki dekhate ki un logon ka kaisa parinaam hua hai jo unase pahale guzare hain? haalaanki ve shakti mein unase kahee badh-chadhakar the. allaah aisa nahin ki aakaashon mein koee cheez use maat kar sake aur na dharatee hee mein. nissandeh vah sarvagy, saamarthyamaan hai
